Posts.Content: Hi Kazzakaz Like you I was on my own when I was told. Feel left in dark wish they had given me written results. Go to see my oncologist on Monday 11 May after having lump removed and told I have stage 111 cancer. don't know what this means .Will know Monday if need chemo. Keep your chin up we are thinking about you.
Posts.Title: I can no longer cope

Posts.Content: Hi Kateandbiz Glad to say I did it full of pain killers and a different radiographer . She kindly padded the base of scanner and made a pad for my neck. Start my rads on the 30th June for 4 weeks. Feel much happier now something is at last starting. Lets get rid  of any remaining little devils. Thank you for asking. I hope you are  well on your way with your treatment.
Posts.Title: ctscan

Posts.Content: Hi I  went for my ct scan to start my radiotherapy but could not lie down due to back pain. They did make two attempts at this then made another appointment to try again on moday. Anyone know what happens if I am unable to lie down. Will I not be able to have my radiotherapy. I am stage 2 grade 3 breast cancer.
Posts.Title: ctscan

Posts.Content: Hi Kateandbiz.Thanks for advice have started taking pain killers and I have left a message for my BC nurse. Worried because lady from radiography team said there was a cut off time to give radiotherapy .Don't know what she means to upset yesterday to ask will ask nurse today.Many many thanks for replying so fast. All the best with your treatment.
Posts.Title: ctscan
